about_the_game:
As a survivor of a tragic plane crash, you fight for survival on an island inhabited by prehistoric creatures. Explore, fight, survive and uncover the history of the tragic consequences of an experiment. Immerse yourself in a survival adventure like never before.

Key Features

In Reptile Park, you will experience many thrills. Explore the powerful world of prehistoric creatures and immerse yourself in immersive experiences.

You can expect:

  • Creating items that will help you survive on an island full of deadly reptiles
  • The ability to play in multiplayer mode, either in PVP or co-op.
  • Discover the island's history based on elements of the environment
  • Realistic graphics
  • Huge exploration space
  • The ability to create traps for wild creatures
  • The ability to fight hand-to-hand, shoot with a bow, use firearms
  • Advanced mechanics of herbalism, fishing, food preparation, creating bandages and healing wounds
  • Mechanics of controlling character's vital functions
  • Changes in weather conditions during the game

    Find a way to survive. Overcome obstacles. Develop a plan to leave the island. Discover all the objects and find out the cause that led to the failure of further experiments.
    Will you make it out of this adventure alive?

    Story

    As a young traveler, you set out with your loved one on the trip of a lifetime. Your air travel went smoothly, until a powerful storm appeared. Unfortunately, fate had it that the extreme weather conditions damaged the engine of the plane you were traveling on. The damage and turbulence ultimately led to the loss of control of the machine. The plane crashes on a mysterious island, controlled by prehistoric reptiles, and now you have to adapt to a completely new reality. This is where your fight for survival begins. Without any contact with the outside world, you must survive in this unknown environment and find a way to escape the island.

name: Reptile Park VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / Radeon RX 480 (min. 4GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 \ Radeon RX Vega 64 \ Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX

short_description: As a survivor of a tragic plane crash, you fight for survival on an island inhabited by prehistoric creatures. Explore, fight, survive and uncover the history of the tragic consequences of an experiment. Immerse yourself in a survival adventure like never before.
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
